name: Blood Harvest 3
description: Dynamic, hardcore and explosive action on the passage with a bunch of weapons, enemies and bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz and higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 / AMD Radeon R7 240 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
